unauthorised: You are not authorised to access this resource
test-indexed: Number: {count, selectordinal, one{#st} two{#nd} few{#rd} other{#th}}
welcome-stranger: It looks like you don't have an account. Let's set one up now.
welcome-known: Hello and welcome to the biometrics for all.
verification-request: To access your account, please repeat the following phrase:
verification-confirmation: Great! Your passphrase has been validated with {confidence}% confidence.
verification-failed: We were not able to verify your voice. Please try again.
enrol-confirmation: Great. To complete your registration, we need {remaining, plural, one {# more enrolment} other {# more enrolments}}.
enrol-confidence-low: Sorry, the recording was not clear. Please try again.
enrol-no-phrase: There are no more available phrases to enrol with.
enrolment-complete: Thanks. Your voice is now registered.
deactivate-account: Your account has been successfully deactivated. Please hold to answer our short survey, or we hope to see you soon! Thank you.
reactivation-welcome: Hello. It looks like your number is deactivated. In way to proceed with your reactivation you must verify your voice.
reactivation-confirmation: Welcome back,, your number is reactivated.
mobile-money: To access your mobile money account, press {index}.
mobile-money-balance: To check your mobile money balance, press {index}.
passphrase-manager: To record new verification phrases, press {index}
reset-pin: To change your PIN number, press {index}
bill-payment-number: The payment number you entered is {payment}
bill-payment-error: Sorry, the payment number you entered is not valid
bill-payment-value: The payment will cost you ${paymentValue}, press 1 if you want to proceed or 2 to cancel the payment
bill-payment-invalid-value: Sorry, you do not have the required funds in your account to make this transaction.
transfer-message: Please insert the payee's account number
transfer-account-number: The account number you entered is {account}
transfer-account-error: Sorry, the account number you entered is not valid
transfer-account-value: Please enter the value you want to transfer.
transfer-account-invalid-value: Sorry, you do not have the required funds in your account to make this transaction.
transfer-account-confirmation: You are transferring ${value} to {account}, press 1 if you want to proceed or 2 to cancel
passphrase-add: To add a new passphrase, press {index}
balance-reset: Your account balance is $0, for the purposes of this demo it has been reset to $100.
alert-welcome: Hello. This is a demo call from the "Biometrics For All" project. Some suspicious activity has been flagged on your account. Please verify your identity to authorise this transaction.
alert-message: To simulate an Alert, please visit our web page and follow the instructions.
alert-unregistered: This phone number has not yet enrolled for voice verification.
reset-pin-change: To change your PIN number, press {index}
reset-pin-reset: To reset your PIN number, press {index}
reset-pin-welcome: Please key in your current PIN number.
reset-pin-current-welcome: Please key in your new PIN number.
reset-pin-current-successful: Great. Your PIN has been verified. Please key in your new PIN number.
reset-pin-current-unsuccessful: The PIN number provided does not match our records. Please try again.
reset-pin-current-error: Sorry, we couldn't process your pin. Please make sure it is 4 digits long.
reset-pin-new-successful: Your PIN number has been updated.
reset-pin-new-unsuccessful: Sorry, we couldn't process your new pin. Please make sure it is 4 digits long.
sms-unregistered: It looks like you don't have an account. Please contact the call centre directly to enrol before using SMS services.
sms-did-not-understand: This option does not match any of our SMS terms. Please try again.
sms-reset-pin-welcome: Hello. This is a demo call from the "Biometrics For All " project. You have requested to reset your PIN. Before doing so, please verify your identity.
survey-welcome: Thank you for evaluating Biometrics For All. Please answer the next questions using your keypad.
survey-question-01: How would you evaluate the experience using a voice verification process? Press a number from 1 to 5., where 1 means very poor and 5 means excellent.
survey-question-02: Did you think the menu flow was easy to understand? Press a number from 1 to 5, where 1 means very difficult and 5 means very easy.
survey-finish: Thank you. Your answers have been recorded. Good bye!
did-not-understand: Sorry, I didn't get that. Please try again.
return-menu: To return to the main menu, press {index}
survey-option: To answer our short survey, press {index}
good-bye: Thank you for using Biometrics For All, Good bye!
unapproved-caller: Welcome to the showcase: Biometrics for All,,, To test this call centre, please contact the GSMA inclusive tech lab to authorize your telephone.
